attributes.additional_details: Because the police don't care. Despite witness and vet reports and previous complaints about local kids, the police wouldn't investigate the murder of my cat
attributes.background: Make sure the police investigate any vicious attacks or hit and runs of animal deaths

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear about the loss of your cat. Please accept our condolences.

Decision on the investigation of crimes is an operational decision for police forces. We could accept a petition calling for increased funding to investigate these crimes, or for the creation of new criminal offences.
